A MINIMUM SEPARATION OF FOUR (4) PAGES IS REQUIRED BETWEEN A BROWN & WILL- IAMSON INSERTION AND A COMPETITIVE TOBACCO AD. DO NOT RUN MORE THAN ONE BROWN & WILLIAMSON PRODUCT IN ANY ONE ISSUE.
